snippet.title: Resident Evil 4 - Official Separate Ways Trailer (4K) | State of Play 2023
snippet.description:
Check out the latest trailer for Resident Evil 4 to see DLC reveals for the survival horror game, including the Separate Ways DLC, content update for The Mercenaries, and the Resident Evil 4 VR Mode.

Resident Evil 4's Separate Ways DLC will be available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, and Steam on September 21, 2023. An additional content update for The Mercenaries will also be available on September 21, 2023, and The Mercenaries is available now on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X/S, and Steam. Finally, Resident Evil 4 VR Mode will be available this winter on PlayStation VR2.
